alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Brazoria Islands; Galveston Island; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued December 27 at 9:57PM CST until December 28 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...High risk of rip currents and elevated surf along area beaches. * WHERE...Matagorda Islands, Brazoria Islands, Galveston Island and Bolivar Peninsula Counties. * WHEN...Through at least Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If visiting the beach while temperatures remain well above normal, keep in mind that lifeguards are not staffed at summertime levels and may be unable to assist as rapidly compared to the spring, summer and fall months.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.
